title: Grilled pork chops with grapefruit relish
ingredients: ['950ml water', '500ml orange juice', '145g salt', '110g light brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon garlic granules', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground thyme', '4 boneless pork chops', '2 grapefruits, juiced', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon red chilli flakes', '1 grapefruit, peeled and sectioned', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
